triples.evidence: we want to bring all imaging modalities - CT, nuclear imaging, and MRI - together into a single integrated system.
a scanner capable of capturing structural, functional, and molecular information - all at the same time, perfectly aligned in space and synchronized in time.

concepts.term: perfectly aligned in space and synchronized in time
